meanings.definition: The act or process of typing on a keyboard.
meanings.sent1: Her typings were fast and accurate.
meanings.sent2: I saved all my typings in a folder on the computer.
meanings.sent3: His typings were so loud, they sounded like drumming.
meanings.sent4: The typings echoed through the room like a symphony of clicks.
meanings.sent5: The typings of the secretary filled the office with a rhythmic melody.

meanings.definition: The result or product of typing on a keyboard.
meanings.sent1: The typings on the screen were full of errors.
meanings.sent2: She printed out the typings for proofreading.
meanings.sent3: The typings on the paper seemed to dance in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: His typings were like a trail of breadcrumbs leading to his thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The typings on the document were clear and easy to read.
